answers.answer: I was diagnosed with gd at 28weeks too and when i stood on the scale that day i was shocked to see i gained 3kg in 1week. After doing the diet and checked my weight 1 month later the 3kg was gone. Am doing fine and gaining weight gradually. Will be 36 weeks on monday :)

I don't have GD but I have lost weight my entire pregnancy. My first trimester I lost about 7lbs, my second I gained 5 , and each prenatal appointment I go to now every two weeks I lose 1-4 lbs. It's not normal but doc says as long as she is healthy, everything is fine. She is measuring right on schedule. I will be 36 weeks Mon. Doc also said as long as I don't lose like 10lbs or more everything is fine

thanks ladies. ive done alittle  ready and it doesn't  seem like its a huge concern...unless like you mentioned a drastic weight lose. apparently the last few weeks you can lose weight as amniotic fluid production decreases and the nesting starts (burning more calories  from all the cleaning) plus not being able to eat as much with the stomach being squished. I'll still  mention  it to the midwife because they dont weight you every visit.
